title: Nvidia Debuts New AI Tools for Autonomous Vehicles, Robots
description: Nvidia Corp., aiming to extend the reach of its technology, announced a group of AI models and tools designed to speed the development of autonomous vehicles and power a new generation of robots.

title: Data Centers Added $6.5 Billion to Secure Power for Big US Grid
description: Data centers tied to the biggest US grid just tacked on another $6.5 billion to the cost of procuring power supplies, adding to concerns that the AI boom is worsening energy inflation.

title: Vistra to Buy Big US Gas-Powered Fleet for $4 Billion
description: Vistra Corp. agreed to buy 10 natural gas-fired plants in the US northeast and in Texas for about $4 billion in cash and stock, giving the electricity supplier additional generation capacity in fast-growing power markets.
